author: Shaurya Malwa
title: Ether, Solana, and Other Majors Could Slide Further as Trump Threatens Iran Strikes
description: Tensions in the Middle East are fueling a flight to safety, with traders rotating out of altcoins into stablecoins and bitcoin amid uncertainty around U.S. military escalation and sticky inflation.
content:
Shaurya is the Co-Leader of the CoinDesk tokens and data team in Asia with a focus on crypto derivatives, DeFi, market microstructure, and protocol analysis.
Shaurya holds over $1,000 in BTC, ETH, S… [+467 chars]
